p: Summer savory essential oil is considered safe for human consumption by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration [ 75]. As every essential oil, SHEO can produce dermal irritations and of the mucous membranes [ 1, 76]. Pure SHEO has an oral of 1370 mg/kg (rats) and a dermal toxicology of 340 mg/kg (guinea pig) [ 77], Buckle [ 78] estimating a 19 mL oral lethal dose for a child. Due to its particular scent, SHEO found application in perfumery industry [ 79] and beverage industry (for the production of vermouth) [ 80], besides the classical application in food industry or in commercial spice mixtures for sausages, pâtés or pickles [ 63].
